text:
@WhiteHouse The ones who still have jobs. For the millions who lost their jobs thanks to Trump completely botching covid19 response, you're out of luck. For those whose jobs were saved thanks to PPP, your luck runs out when the PPP funds do. 

Economy will keep sputtering as covid19 spreads.
